title: disenchanting two champion shards, received no blue essence
body:
Hey I just disenchanted 

1x Xin Zhao champion shard 
1x Sivir champion  shard

because i had two of each. At the start I had 1666 blue essence, and after disenchanting the first one i thought i was seeing things, so i disenchanted another and i confirmed that i was indeed not getting any blue essence.

replies.body:
Wait an hour~ and relog. If there's still no change submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They can see what went where, and how much you should have.
